name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Skilled in developing robust applications using **.NET**, **ReactJS**, and **Azure**, I bring over 8 years of experience as a Senior Developer. My background in software engineering equips me with the capabilities to lead teams effectively, fostering **collaboration** and promoting **agility** within projects. I have a proven track record of delivering high-performance solutions, encapsulating my expertise in **DevOps** methodologies for streamlined processes and enhanced product delivery. My original strengths in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy), along with a solid foundation in frontend frameworks such as **Angular**, **Vue**, **Next.js**, and database optimization using **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, contribute to creating secure and efficient applications tailored to business needs. I am committed to continuous **learning** and mentoring, ensuring that my team remains at the forefront of technology trends while achieving enterprise-grade results.

experience.responsibilities:
- Leveraged **.NET** technology to architect and develop cloud-native solutions, enhancing the efficiency of healthcare data management.
- Championed **DevOps** practices by implementing CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, reducing deployment times by **40%**.
- Fostered team collaboration by leading a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers, emphasizing communication and teamwork in achieving project milestones.
- Utilized **Azure** services to deploy scalable applications, ensuring high availability and resilience in cloud environments.
- Implemented agile methodologies, promoting continuous learning and adaptability within the team.
- Designed user interfaces using **ReactJS**, improving the user experience and increasing engagement by **30%**.
- Developed and integrated secure APIs with **.NET**, facilitating seamless communication with third-party systems while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards.
- Guided the transition towards modern microservices architecture, enhancing system scalability and maintainability.
- Mentored junior developers in best coding practices, emphasizing the importance of collaboration and agile practices.
- Collaborated with stakeholders across departments to gather requirements and deliver innovative solutions that meet evolving business needs.
- Championed knowledge-sharing sessions around **.NET** technologies, fostering a culture of continuous improvement in technical skills.

- Utilized **.NET** frameworks to enhance existing applications improving scalability and performance in line with business strategies.
- Led a team to develop and deploy solutions using **ReactJS** for responsive user interfaces, ensuring seamless user experiences across web applications.
- Fostered effective **communication** and **collaboration** among team members and external stakeholders to align project objectives and enhance development processes.
- Championed **agility** in project management practices, leading iterative development cycles to quickly adapt to changing market demands.
- Ensured continuous **learning** and knowledge sharing within the team, promoting best practices and innovative solutions that led to a **15%** increase in productivity.
- Mentored junior developers, providing guidance on **DevOps** practices and CI/CD methodologies to strengthen team capabilities and confidence in deployments.
- Delivered high-quality software solutions by leading automated testing efforts through **.NET** and establishing performance benchmarks that reduced bug count by **30%**.
- Enhanced team leadership through effective delegation and support, resulting in the successful on-time delivery of **5 major projects** over **12 months**.
- Maintained strong client relationships, fostering collaboration that contributed to a **20% increase** in project renewal rates due to enhanced service delivery.
- Spearheaded strategic planning sessions, focusing on aligning technical solutions with business goals, resulting in measurable improvements in customer satisfaction scores.

Led a team in developing and optimizing backend services for an e-commerce platform utilizing **.NET** technologies, improving scalability and performance across various modules by **30%**.
Drove the architecture of robust RESTful APIs in **.NET** for scalable frontend and backend integration, ensuring efficient real-time customer interactions.
Implemented **Azure** DevOps for CI/CD pipelines to facilitate up to **50 deployments** per week while maintaining consistent code quality and reducing delivery time by **20%**.
Collaborated cross-functionally with frontend teams using **ReactJS** to build dynamic, responsive interfaces integrated with backend services, enhancing user experience significantly.
Enhanced team agility through effective communication and collaboration practices, resulting in a **40%** increase in project delivery speed.
Fostered a culture of continuous learning and adaptation within the team, leading to improved coding standards and practices.
Designed secure authentication mechanisms using **.NET** for customer access with RBAC and OAuth 2.0, ensuring compliant and secure transaction processing.
Established code quality assessments through peer reviews and automated testing frameworks that reduced bugs by **25%** post-deployment.
Conducted regular knowledge transfer sessions and workshops, uplifting team's proficiency in modern tools and **.NET** frameworks.
Managed performance testing initiatives with tools like Apache JMeter, identifying and addressing bottlenecks to handle peak traffic loads effectively, achieving up to **1000 concurrent users** support.
Orchestrated successful migration projects from legacy systems to modern **.NET** architectures, minimizing disruptions and preserving critical workflows.

skills:
Programming Languages:

**Backend Frameworks:**

**Frontend Frameworks:**

**API Technologies:**
	REST & gRPC APIs

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS (ECS, Lambda, RDS, S3), Azure (App Services, Blob, SQL)

**Databases:**
	PostgreSQL (Fintech), MySQL (Healthcare), MongoDB (Gaming), Redis

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	Keycloak (OIDC, RBAC), JWT, OAuth2, Let’s Encrypt, Nginx, Certbot

**Other:**
	communication, collaboration, agility, learning, team leadership
